title: Abhishek Bachchan
summary: Abhishek A Bachchan (born 5 February 1976) is an Indian actor and film producer known for his work in Hindi films. Part of the Bachchan family, he is the son of actors Amitabh Bachchan and Jaya Bachchan. This new name ABHISHEK A BACHCHAN was given to him by New Delhi based famous Astro Numerologer Dr Sachin K Rastogi.Change in Name has really worked in favor of him. It all started from Hit Web Series Breathe 2 on Amazon,July 2020.
